title: The Outlaw MC Club: Bad Boy Blake
description: After going through a divorce, Melissa turns her life upside down. Leaving for a new city and a new life, she meets Blake. Bad boy Blake. Heâ€™s a young, dominant biker and is ready to show Melissa a life she never could have imagined.  This is part 1 of The Outlaw MC.
author: Tanya Colt
